Articles.Content:
So recently I've noticed that upvoting/plussing/thumbs upping while on mobile doesn't work.  There is the little animation and the symbol changes, but it hasn't upvoted anything.

I only have Android to try on, but I've tried three browsers, with and without the "gimme the desktop version" tagged, so it's probably not the stylesheets. Makes me wonder if after triggering the animation there's a call to a function that's been deprecated on the latest Android.
You have to double tap because reasons.

10 hours ago, klgraham1013 said:

You have to double tap because reasons.

<string of comical characters in place of expletives>

Yep, that worked. Of all the things I tried, I never thought of that. Thanks
Looks like it’s set up to be a drop down menu of responses so tap to open then tap to choose. But only ‘like’ is enabled.
Moving to Kerbal Network, since this is about the forum rather than KSP itself.
